biotools.summary: MLtree is a software to compute maximum likelihood optimization of models of character evolution (either DNA or phenotypic ones) along the branches of a phylogenetic tree. It is assuming that the phylogenetic tree is known.

bioschemas.name: MLtree
bioschemas.summary: MLtree is a software to compute maximum likelihood optimization of models of character evolution (either DNA or phenotypic ones) along the branches of a phylogenetic tree. It is assuming that the phylogenetic tree is known.
